(1 - _sellAmount / _supply) ^ (1 / (_reserveRatio / MAX_RESERVE_RATIO)))","params":{"_reserveBalance":"total reserve token balance","_reserveRatio":"constant reserve ratio, represented in ppm, 1-1000000","_sellAmount":"sell amount, in the continuous token itself","_supply":"continuous token total supply"},"returns":{"_0":"sale return amount"}}},"title":"BondingCurve on Bancor formula by Bancor Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more contributor license agreements; and to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0. \"","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/home/adeel/Desktop/ninjaswap-core/contracts/BondingCurve/BondingCurve.sol":"BondingCurve"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/home/adeel/Desktop/ninjaswap-core/contracts/BondingCurve/BondingCurve.sol":{"keccak256":"0x40a374d21d5deb6db46ceef9a6a3218d838cf3ef2ec40b690766ef798beb1b4f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fb754c7431cce4cfd39759cda572ccafa6b4751856a1c97c379d814227096273","dweb:/ipfs/QmW34ZYvLBVuGbhKPpnYmYpsMLjiaUDnHY1UWNsGV2iadQ"]},"/home/adeel/Desktop/ninjaswap-core/contracts/BondingCurve/Power.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9d52553d51f306f038bb83d2bf186986da3d513a05a7b0992571f96d1e71e0dd","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b87452928e32abedf7177ac37032b4580b1c9338fa730cd84e1fc7392fbfa627","dweb:/ipfs/QmWBDDN23AAQSwBbPF1VAp9mhcGQfX387oRLbssTCeVUY9"]},"@openzeppelin/contracts/math/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcc78a17dd88fa5a2edc60c8489e2f405c0913b377216a5b26b35656b2d0dab52","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://526dc85e1f9b9b45830e202568d267d93dde7a4fcccf4ad7798dadcd92304d3c","dweb:/ipfs/QmaoXMB972J3cSDLtBq3xBo4jLwqD2uzXTwujtSPqkYVhR"]}},"version":1}

calculatePurchaseReturn(uint256,uint256,.details: given a continuous token supply, reserve token balance, reserve ratio, and a deposit amount (in the reserve token), calculates the return for a given conversion (in the continuous token) Formula: Return = _supply * ((1 + _depositAmount / _reserveBalance) ^ (_reserveRatio / MAX_RESERVE_RATIO) - 1)

calculateSaleReturn(uint256,uint256,uint.details: given a continuous token supply, reserve token balance, reserve ratio and a sell amount (in the continuous token), calculates the return for a given conversion (in the reserve token) Formula: Return = _reserveBalance * (1 - (1 - _sellAmount / _supply) ^ (1 / (_reserveRatio / MAX_RESERVE_RATIO)))

params._reserveRatio: constant reserve ratio, represented in ppm, 1-1000000
params._sellAmount: sell amount, in the continuous token itself

devdoc.title: BondingCurve on Bancor formula by Bancor Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more contributor license agreements; and to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0. "
